mapper.insert: insert into tb_language(lang_word, lang_meaning, lang_etc, category_idx, lang_reg_id, lang_reg_date) values (#{langWord},#{langMeaning},#{langEtc},#{categoryIdx},#{langRegId},curdate())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_language where lang_reg_id = #{id} and category_idx =#{categoryIdx} and ( lang_reg_date = curdate() or lang_reg_date = (curdate() - interval 1 day) or lang_reg_date = (curdate() - interval 3 day) or lang_reg_date = (curdate() - interval 10 day) or lang_reg_date = (curdate() - interval 24 day) or lang_reg_date = (curdate() - interval 54 day) or lang_reg_date = (curdate() - interval 144 day)) ;
